text: you've been surprised by the reaction
absolutely astonished Kannan I don't
think I mentioned once any particular
religion and I certainly didn't intend
and in fact I know I didn't say anything
offensive towards any particular
religion I said quite a few things that
were angry at this supposed God but I as
many saying things that Bertrand Russell
and many finer heads than mine have said
for hundreds of years going all the way
back to the Greeks some people been
pointing out very similar to what CS
Lewis said before he became a Christian
yes CS Lewis wrote a book called the
problem of pain as well when he was a
Christian how can this creator who is
apparently benign cause the one I chose
was bone cancer and children even if you
believe conveniently now that Darwin has
existed that God sort of wound up the
clock and started evolution you even
said well if knew everything you could
do everything why would he allow such
monstrous cruelty and that's all the
only point I was making i I was
astonished that it has caused so viral
and explosion on Twitter and elsewhere
and very grateful to the Archbishop of
Canterbury to apparently said the other
day that I had every right to say what I
said and I should hope I do and I'm most
pleased I think that it's got people
talking
